metadata.title: CVE-2017-17511 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: KildClient 3.1.0 does not validate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL, related to prefs.c and worldgui.c.

criterions.comment: kildclient package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.0-2').
